description: Engine output is an array of analysis results
title: This document describes the structure of engine output

___messages.description: List of messages in the path

___path.description: The path relative to the analysis root

___messages.description: List of messages in the path

___ruleNs.description: The namespace of the rule that produced the message

___description.description: The explanatory text of the message

___ruleName.description: The name of the rule that produced the message

___columnEnd.description: The end column where the message is located

___ruleId.description: The id of the rule that produced the message

___column.description: The column where the message is located

___message.description: The short description of the message

___lineEnd.description: The end line where the message is located (the same as line by default)

___line.description: The line where the message is located
